name: Hot Buttered Rum
description: Let's start the weekend right--with a cocktail recipe from Paul Clarke (The Cocktail Chronicles). Need more than one? Hit up the archives. Cheers! Until very recently, I found the concept of hot-buttered rum more appealing than the reality hot-buttered rum....
recipeIngredient: 4 ounces (1 stick) unsalted butter, room temperature
8 ounces brown sugar or Demerara sugar (Sugar in the Raw)

recipeInstructions.text: Cream the butter with the sugar in a stand mixer (or by hand with a wooden spoon) and add the spices. Keep refrigerated.
Add batter to a warm mug and pour in 2 ounces of boiling water. Stir to mix, add rum and the rest of the water, stir again. Garnish with fresh nutmeg.
